title: The David Ones
description: A 15 year old aspiring web developer experimenting with programming by publishing my work on the web.

items.title: My experience showcasing one of my projects on Reddit - and how my website's visits tripled.
items.summary: A couple of months back, I created my own self-hosted dashboard as I didn't like the standard ones that were out there. On October 1st, I decided to post it on r/homelab, and something crazy happened...

items.title: Your home router sucks! Replace it with pfSense!
items.summary: Recently, I decided to switch from my standard cheap home router, to a custom virtual machine running pfSense on my server. This blog post will contain all the hurdles and issues that I went through, and how you can setup this up for yourself!

items.title: How I persist live data in Next.js without waiting for async requests.
items.summary: While working on one of my projects, I came across a problem with fetching dynamic data from my API. The problem was that I didn't want to do the request on every render, just when I wanted it to be fetched. So I came up with a unique solution.

items.title: Welcome to my Blog! - The backstory, How it works, etc.
items.summary: This is my first ever blog post on this website! On this blog post I completely document how the Blog post works, to the seeing how many views it has to storing the actual blog post in the first place. Worth a read!
